attributes.action: consider changing from a "national" anthem to an "English" anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE the undersigned believe that god save the queen is an outdated anthem which should be replaced by the more nationalistic tune of JERUSALEM.We believe the song to be more uplifting and more in keeping with the feelings of the general public.
We believe that god save the queen should only be used at events where great britain as a nation is competing or being represented.
At all other times i.e sporting events between british countries.The anthem should be "Englands" jerusalem.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
